‘City-Top’ is a robust, compact-fruiting strain of Chestnut mushroom (Pholiota adiposa) selected for its reliable performance in container culture and exceptional culinary qualities. This cultivar produces dense clusters of beautiful, cinnamon to chestnut-brown caps with distinctive, darker, appressed scales and a thick, meaty texture. Bred to fruit prolifically on supplemented substrate blocks, ‘City-Top’ delivers a rich, nutty, and slightly peppery flavor that intensifies with cooking, making it a superior choice for the urban cultivator seeking gourmet quality.
